section.title: Changing the path environment variable
section.para: Several Windows dependencies require the path environment variable to be changed. To do so, open the Control panel, then click on System; in the system panel window, click on Advanced system settings (see below).
In the system properties window, click on Environment Variables...; another window pops up. Select Path in the list of system variables, and click Edit...
Append the absolute path to the folder of interest at the end of the Variable value string, semicolon separated. Be careful not to accidentally modify the rest of the variable value.

section.title: SWIG
section.para: The latest version of swigwin can be downloaded from the SWIG download page. Unzip it, then add the folder containing swig.exe to the Path environment variable.
